lead_paragraph: The Olympic bronze medalist Toby Dawson announced his retirement from moguls skiing yesterday to work on his golf game and continue a low-key effort to find his birth parents in South Korea. Born in South Korea, Dawson was adopted by two ski instructors in Vail, Colo.
